title: Introducing: Midi Matilda
body: San Francisco’s [**Midi Matilda**](http://www.facebook.com/midimatilda?sk=wall) write electro-pop that deserves to be heard. Grand choruses, addictive hooks and echoed vocals galore, their two debut tracks are perfect for that Sunday morning comedown. Shuffling in somewhere between **MGMT** and **Washed Out**, the reverb heavy _Day Dreams_ is a startlingly confident first foray into the scene. On the other hand, _Red Light District_ is a more melancholic affair, reminiscing about a mysterious lady of the night and our all-to-human urges. Check out the two debut tracks from **Midi Matilda** below. Red Light District by midi matilda
